snippet.title: Employee A Gameplay Trailer [UPDATED]
snippet.description:
Employee A DEMO OUT ON MARCH 1! Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1815690/Employee_A/

When you find yourself charged with the murder of Xiao Li, you'll need all the help you can get. But it seems like everyone has their own agenda...

In Employee A, you can:

👩‍💻 play as a woman in tech
🔍 solve a murder mystery
🏢 confront toxic workplace culture
🍕 prove your innocence with pizza

***

You wake up in a hospital and discover you're under arrest for the murder of a complete stranger. Having lost your recent memories, you turn to your co-workers for help. You quickly realize, however, that they're hiding the truth from you...what are they up to? You need to break through the constrictive culture and politics of the tech industry to solve the murder and clear your name.

Who killed Xiao Li? Why did she die? And what were her tax returns doing in your car?

Employee A is a mystery adventure game that will have you unwind a cryptic murder mystery while dealing with the harsh and uncompromising world of the modern high technology industry. Meet your fellow employees at tech startup DataMantle, explore relationships across the Silicon Valley corporate ladder, and come face to face with mental illness, trauma, desperation and greed. Warm and sunny Santa Clara awaits you.

Coming to Mac and PC in 2022.


Developed by cross_couloir: https://linktr.ee/cross_couloir
